summary: This is an internal FBI email from July 2, 2020, inquiring about the location and timing of Ghislaine Maxwell's initial court appearance following her arrest. It highlights coordination within law enforcement regarding her case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email inquiry regarding her initial court appearance, indicating she was recently arrested or in custody.

events.title: FBI Inquiry on Maxwell's Initial Appearance
events.description: An FBI agent sends an internal email asking for information about the location and timing of Ghislaine Maxwell's initial court appearance.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email dated July 2, 2020.
The email's subject is 'Maxwell', indicating Ghislaine Maxwell is the focus.
The content is a direct inquiry about the logistics of Maxwell's initial court appearance, suggesting recent arrest or detention.
The email shows internal law enforcement coordination regarding Maxwell's case at that time.
